INTERIOR & LANDSCAPE DESIGN

ABOUT SASSAFRAS

Turning every house into a warm home, that's the essence of Sassafras Designs. We create coastal inspired spaces with a modern twist, allowing you to experience that fresh feeling again and again.....

  • Read More

MY STORY

The question that begins every project is “what is the client hoping to achieve?” “Is it: a space infused with brightness and energy or a peaceful respite from the outside world?” “Or is it just a few tweaks here and there to refresh a well loved home?”

Owner and principal designer Maggie Stansfield set out to learn how to develop the answers to those questions when she left a long career in the legal world in Washington DC to return home to Newport and explore her creative side. Sassafras Designs was born in the summer of 2012 after a new beginning at Rhode Island School of Design in Providence, Rhode Island. She has been the owner and principal designer at Sassafras Designs ever since.

OUR WORK

ESPECIALLY FOR WEDDINGS
AND MEMORABLE TABLES

Let us elevate your dining and entertainment experience with our curated collection of custom artisanal tableware hand painted in Paris, France on Limoges porcelain.  Made to mix not just to match, each collection designed by Marie Daage Paris is available in a range of more than 68 colors from which endless combinations can be created.  Each piece is meticulously crafted to transform every meal into a memorable occasion.  Explore our range of uniquely designed and expertly made tableware that adds an extra touch of elegance to your table.  Whether just a few pieces to compliment what you already have or an entire new range of dinnerware, let Sassafras Designs help you create your very own custom tableware that will be uniquely yours! 

  • Learn more

SASSAFRAS
DOES WEDDINGS

Build your perfect registry. You’ve set the date, now let’s get started! This is your chance to build the table of your dreams with pieces that you’ll not only love for years to come but will grow with you as your lives grow and trends change. It’s also the best way to help friends and family find something you’ll both love.  We recommend making your selections and adding pieces before your first celebration (like the engagement party or wedding shower) to ensure there are ample gifting options. Be sure to include a link to your registry on your wedding website so it’s easily accessible.

For more inspiration, you can explore samples of our collections as well as the Lookbooks attached to this site.

  • Registry FAQ

What People are Saying

“It has been a pleasure ....

“It has been a pleasure working with the designer. The project was to design and decorate the whole house. Every room was well thought out. The whole house came together as a perfect finished piece. The designer was very cooperative in getting my input, likes and dislikes. The end product turned out to be one beyond my imagination- a absolutely perfect designed and decorated home which we are looking forward to enjoy. Thank you for all the hard work, creativity and fun along the way."

"Maggie did an....

"Maggie did an outstanding job from start to finish! She quickly learned my preferences then magically created a number of options. As someone who admittedly can go into analysis paralysis when faced with too many choices, I greatly appreciate Maggie’s ability to narrow down the scope of options to a manageable size. And I couldn’t be more pleased with how things turned out! My room was transformed from one that was rather blasé to one that is warm, yet chic. The look and feel are precisely what I was looking for. Thank you very much, Maggie!"

"Sassafras Designs....

"Sassafras Designs has been assisting me with my Jamestown, RI property. They have been instrumental in the garden designs, selection of plants / flowers, discussions and actual planting. What a transformation of the landscape! The ideas put forth are done so with enthusiasm, creativity and clarity of the "why" and "when". What's important to mention is their attention to detail no matter how small it may be and completion of each job on time (as agreed upon by both parties). Sassafras has supplied me with the most beautiful and authentic Pottery Vases for the gardens from France! They went above and beyond by driving them to RI!"
